name: Jingoku
summary:
Welcome to Jingoku!

Jingoku is a physics-based block tower driven minigame collection - complete as many minigames as you can before the tower collapses! You’ll earn achievements, see your stats and find out how you rank compared to other players around the world.

Your ability to read Japanese will be of no use to you here, but fast and precise mouse skills shall see you well.
